questiontext.text: From each of two normally distributed populations with equal variances a sample is drawn.______________. Sample 1: n = 11, mean = 43, sd = 8.06 Sample 2: n = 14, mean = 55, sd = 10.02. The pooled variance estimator takes the value 84.99. It is tested Whether the population averages are equal. The corresponding test size follows, if the null hypothesis is TRUE,

answer.text: An F-distribution with 10 and 13 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-distribution with 10 and 13 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: A T-division with 25 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-division with 25 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: An F-division with 11 and 14 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-division with 11 and 14 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: A T distribution with 23 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-division with 23 degrees of freedom: Correct
